post.description: Get details on an underlying instrument for the option symbol provided.
Get the option chain for the underlying instrument.

GetUnderlyingForOptionOutput.example:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
 <soapenv:Body>
  <tns:GetUnderlyingForOptionResponse xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/">
   <tns:GetUnderlyingForOptionResult>
    <tns:InstrumentBrief><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
     <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
     <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
     <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
     <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
     <tns:Name>string</tns:Name>
     <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
     <tns:ISIN>string</tns:ISIN>
     <tns:CUSIP>string</tns:CUSIP>
     <tns:CompanyIdentifier>string</tns:CompanyIdentifier>
     <tns:Domicile>string</tns:Domicile>
     <tns:CIK>string</tns:CIK>
     <tns:PrimarySEDOL>string</tns:PrimarySEDOL>
     <tns:PrimarySymbol>string</tns:PrimarySymbol>
     <tns:PrimaryExchange>string</tns:PrimaryExchange>
    </tns:InstrumentBrief>
   </tns:GetUnderlyingForOptionResult>
  </tns:GetUnderlyingForOptionResponse>
 </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

GetOptionBySymbolOutput.example:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
 <soapenv:Body>
  <tns:GetOptionBySymbolResponse xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/">
   <tns:GetOptionBySymbolResult>
    <tns:OptionDescription><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
     <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
     <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
     <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
     <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
     <tns:Underlying>
      <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
      <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
      <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
      <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
      <tns:Name>string</tns:Name>
      <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
      <tns:ISIN>string</tns:ISIN>
      <tns:CUSIP>string</tns:CUSIP>
      <tns:CompanyIdentifier>string</tns:CompanyIdentifier>
      <tns:Domicile>string</tns:Domicile>
      <tns:CIK>string</tns:CIK>
      <tns:PrimarySEDOL>string</tns:PrimarySEDOL>
      <tns:PrimarySymbol>string</tns:PrimarySymbol>
      <tns:PrimaryExchange>string</tns:PrimaryExchange>
     </tns:Underlying>
     <tns:Description>string</tns:Description>
     <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
     <tns:Type><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Type>
     <tns:ExpirationDate>string</tns:ExpirationDate>
     <tns:Month><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Month>
     <tns:Year><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Year>
     <tns:StrikePrice><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:StrikePrice>
     <tns:Currency>string</tns:Currency>
     <tns:Exchange>string</tns:Exchange>
     <tns:ExerciseStyle>string</tns:ExerciseStyle>
     <tns:ContractSize><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:ContractSize>
     <tns:ContractSizeUnit>string</tns:ContractSizeUnit>
     <tns:PriceUnit>string</tns:PriceUnit>
     <tns:VolumeUnit>string</tns:VolumeUnit>
     <tns:IsActive><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsActive>
     <tns:IsAdjustedOption><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsAdjustedOption>
     <tns:OptionSymbols>
      <tns:OptionSymbol><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
       <tns:SymbologyType>string</tns:SymbologyType>
       <tns:Symbol>string</tns:Symbol>
      </tns:OptionSymbol>
     </tns:OptionSymbols>
    </tns:OptionDescription>
   </tns:GetOptionBySymbolResult>
  </tns:GetOptionBySymbolResponse>
 </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

GetOptionChainOutput.example:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
 <soapenv:Body>
  <tns:GetOptionChainResponse xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/">
   <tns:GetOptionChainResult>
    <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
    <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
    <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
    <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
    <tns:Underlying>
     <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
     <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
     <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
     <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
     <tns:Name>string</tns:Name>
     <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
     <tns:ISIN>string</tns:ISIN>
     <tns:CUSIP>string</tns:CUSIP>
     <tns:CompanyIdentifier>string</tns:CompanyIdentifier>
     <tns:Domicile>string</tns:Domicile>
     <tns:CIK>string</tns:CIK>
     <tns:PrimarySEDOL>string</tns:PrimarySEDOL>
     <tns:PrimarySymbol>string</tns:PrimarySymbol>
     <tns:PrimaryExchange>string</tns:PrimaryExchange>
    </tns:Underlying>
    <tns:Expirations>
     <tns:Expiration><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
      <tns:ExpirationDate>string</tns:ExpirationDate>
      <tns:Month><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Month>
      <tns:Year><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Year>
      <tns:Calls>
       <tns:OptionDescription><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
        <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
        <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
        <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
        <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
        <tns:Underlying>
         <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
         <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
         <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
         <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
         <tns:Name>string</tns:Name>
         <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
         <tns:ISIN>string</tns:ISIN>
         <tns:CUSIP>string</tns:CUSIP>
         <tns:CompanyIdentifier>string</tns:CompanyIdentifier>
         <tns:Domicile>string</tns:Domicile>
         <tns:CIK>string</tns:CIK>
         <tns:PrimarySEDOL>string</tns:PrimarySEDOL>
         <tns:PrimarySymbol>string</tns:PrimarySymbol>
         <tns:PrimaryExchange>string</tns:PrimaryExchange>
        </tns:Underlying>
        <tns:Description>string</tns:Description>
        <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
        <tns:Type><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Type>
        <tns:ExpirationDate>string</tns:ExpirationDate>
        <tns:Month><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Month>
        <tns:Year><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Year>
        <tns:StrikePrice><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:StrikePrice>
        <tns:Currency>string</tns:Currency>
        <tns:Exchange>string</tns:Exchange>
        <tns:ExerciseStyle>string</tns:ExerciseStyle>
        <tns:ContractSize><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:ContractSize>
        <tns:ContractSizeUnit>string</tns:ContractSizeUnit>
        <tns:PriceUnit>string</tns:PriceUnit>
        <tns:VolumeUnit>string</tns:VolumeUnit>
        <tns:IsActive><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsActive>
        <tns:IsAdjustedOption><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsAdjustedOption>
        <tns:OptionSymbols>
         <tns:OptionSymbol><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
          <tns:SymbologyType>string</tns:SymbologyType>
          <tns:Symbol>string</tns:Symbol>
         </tns:OptionSymbol>
        </tns:OptionSymbols>
       </tns:OptionDescription>
      </tns:Calls>
      <tns:Puts>
       <tns:OptionDescription><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
        <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
        <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
        <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
        <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
        <tns:Underlying>
         <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
         <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
         <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
         <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
         <tns:Name>string</tns:Name>
         <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
         <tns:ISIN>string</tns:ISIN>
         <tns:CUSIP>string</tns:CUSIP>
         <tns:CompanyIdentifier>string</tns:CompanyIdentifier>
         <tns:Domicile>string</tns:Domicile>
         <tns:CIK>string</tns:CIK>
         <tns:PrimarySEDOL>string</tns:PrimarySEDOL>
         <tns:PrimarySymbol>string</tns:PrimarySymbol>
         <tns:PrimaryExchange>string</tns:PrimaryExchange>
        </tns:Underlying>
        <tns:Description>string</tns:Description>
        <tns:Valoren>string</tns:Valoren>
        <tns:Type><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Type>
        <tns:ExpirationDate>string</tns:ExpirationDate>
        <tns:Month><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Month>
        <tns:Year><!-- mandatory -->3</tns:Year>
        <tns:StrikePrice><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:StrikePrice>
        <tns:Currency>string</tns:Currency>
        <tns:Exchange>string</tns:Exchange>
        <tns:ExerciseStyle>string</tns:ExerciseStyle>
        <tns:ContractSize><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:ContractSize>
        <tns:ContractSizeUnit>string</tns:ContractSizeUnit>
        <tns:PriceUnit>string</tns:PriceUnit>
        <tns:VolumeUnit>string</tns:VolumeUnit>
        <tns:IsActive><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsActive>
        <tns:IsAdjustedOption><!-- mandatory -->true</tns:IsAdjustedOption>
        <tns:OptionSymbols>
         <tns:OptionSymbol><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
          <tns:SymbologyType>string</tns:SymbologyType>
          <tns:Symbol>string</tns:Symbol>
         </tns:OptionSymbol>
        </tns:OptionSymbols>
       </tns:OptionDescription>
      </tns:Puts>
     </tns:Expiration>
    </tns:Expirations>
   </tns:GetOptionChainResult>
  </tns:GetOptionChainResponse>
 </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

ListExchangesOutput.example:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
 <soapenv:Body>
  <tns:ListExchangesResponse xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/">
   <tns:ListExchangesResult>
    <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
    <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
    <tns:Identity>string</tns:Identity>
    <tns:Delay><!-- mandatory -->3.14</tns:Delay>
    <tns:ExchangeDescriptions>
     <tns:ExchangeDescription><!-- between zero and unlimited repetitions of this element -->
      <tns:MarketIdentificationCode>string</tns:MarketIdentificationCode>
      <tns:Market>string</tns:Market>
     </tns:ExchangeDescription>
    </tns:ExchangeDescriptions>
   </tns:ListExchangesResult>
  </tns:ListExchangesResponse>
 </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

ListExchangesResponse_tns.example:
<tns:ListExchangesResponse xmlns:tns="http://www.xignite.com/services/">
 <tns:ListExchangesResult>
  <tns:Outcome><!-- mandatory -->string</tns:Outcome>
  <tns:Message>string</tns:Message>
